thread.title: Fiona Apple disses Donald Trump’s ‘Tiny Hands’ in chant for Women’s March

author: USA TODAY
title: Fiona Apple disses Donald Trump’s ‘Tiny Hands’ in chant for Women’s March

organizations.name: getty images for verve records)  fiona apple

text:
Fiona Apple disses Donald Trump’s ‘Tiny Hands’ in chant for Women’s March Erin Jensen, USA TODAY 8:12 a.m. ET Jan. 18, 2017 
Fiona Apple is very clear about one thing in her new chant. (Photo: Charley Gallay, Getty Images for Verve Records) 
Fiona Apple has given participants in the Women’s March a battle cry, while taking a dig at President-elect Donald Trump. 
In the NSFW chant , called Tiny Hands , the singer-songwriter repeats just one lyric: “We don’t want your tiny hands anywhere near our underpants.” 
The collaboration with composer Michael Whalen also samples the now infamous quote from Trump’s conversation with Billy Bush back in 2005, when the soon-to-be POTUS talked about grabbing women by the genitals. <!--iframe--> 
This isn’t the first time Apple has spoken out against Trump through music. Previously she sang a modified version of The Christmas Song , likening the former Apprentice host to a “creepy uncle.”
